statements: UPDATE Discussions SET participation_score = 9.5, interaction_count = 12 WHERE discussion_id = 1;
UPDATE Discussions SET student_id = 30, discussion_topic = 'New Topic' WHERE discussion_id = 3;
UPDATE Discussions SET discussion_topic = 'New Topic', participation_score = 8.5 WHERE student_id = 123 AND discussion_id = 456;
UPDATE Discussions SET interaction_count = interaction_count + 1, participation_score = participation_score + 0.5 WHERE discussion_topic = 'Hot Topic';
UPDATE Discussions SET discussion_topic = 'New Topic', interaction_level = 3 WHERE discussion_id = 1;
UPDATE Students SET student_grade = 'A', student_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE student_id = 5;
UPDATE Discussions SET discussion_topic = 'Updated Topic', interaction_level = 3, participation_status = true WHERE discussion_id = 1;
UPDATE Students SET student_age = 18, student_grade = 'Senior', student_email = 'updated@email.com' WHERE student_id = 2;
UPDATE Discussions SET interaction_count = 10 WHERE discussion_id = 1;
UPDATE Students SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE student_id = 5;
UPDATE Discussions SET participation_status = 'Participated' WHERE discussion_id = 101;
UPDATE Students SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE student_id = 201;
UPDATE Discussions SET discussion_topic='New Topic', participation_status=true WHERE discussion_id=1
UPDATE Discussions SET student_id=3, discussion_topic='Updated Topic' WHERE discussion_id=2
UPDATE Discussions SET participation_status = true WHERE student_id = 101 AND discussion_id = 1;
UPDATE Discussions SET discussion_topic = 'New Topic', participation_status = false WHERE student_id = 102;
UPDATE Discussions SET topic = 'New Topic' WHERE discussion_id = 1;
UPDATE Students SET email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE student_id = 2;
UPDATE Discussions SET timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE discussion_id = 1;
UPDATE Students SET email = 'new_email@example.com', name = 'John Doe' WHERE student_id = 2;
